document.full_text: millions of people in japan's devastated northeast were spending a fourth night without water, food or heating in near-freezing temperatures, as tens of thousands of rescue workers struggled to reach them.
document.title: humanitarian crisis deepens in quake-hit japan
lines_and_colors: millions of people in japan's devastated northeast were spending a fourth night without water, food or heating in near-freezing temperatures, as tens of thousands of rescue workers struggled to reach them.
